name: AnimationStudio
short_description:
Animation Studio Created, Developed, and published by 13 Animation Pictures Inc. 
Studio is Free for Everyone to use, NO PAYMENTS  NECESSARY FOR ANY PURPOSE EXCEPT DONATIONS!!!
If you would like to Join and Help Continue the Project, then email me via evanjohnson6501@yahoo.com and i will either allow you to help or just say Sorry you weren't accepted into helping.
If you are accepted, a Sourceforge.net account is required.

Animation Studio can only be used on Windows, This Software cannot be used on Mac, Linux or any other system except windows.

New Announcement: New Programming Language is being used, C++ is now being used instead of Java. 

Project Official Website: https://sites.google.com/site/www13animationpicturescom/

Written in C++, this software guarantees a well beautiful made interface and working features.
summary: Animation Studio Created by 13 Animation Pictures Inc.
